text.div:
Patient Received Hospice Services

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://www.nlm.nih.gov/research/umls/hcpcs
    Code Display
    G9692 Hospice services received by patient any time during the measurement period
    G9857 Patient admitted to hospice

name: Patient Received Hospice Services
publisher: American Society of Clinical Oncology Steward
